Given the following paragraph, identify the topic sentence.
The performance of a well-crafted toaster depends on three main factors: quality of construction, cost, and convenience. Quality will determine how dependable the toaster is for use on a daily basis. Cost is a key factor in deciding which model to buy. Convenience is determined by how simple the toaster is to use and how easy it is to clean.
The topic sentence of the paragraph is: "The performance of a well-crafted toaster depends on three main factors: quality of construction, cost, and convenience."
